3: The echoes of Pulao's dainty footsteps on the concrete ground come to a halt. Following a few taps, Pulao's little face is lit up by a glowing display screen.
Cold, artificial light shines through the slowly opening blast door, casting elongated shadows behind your figures.
What a massive unmanned data center... Looks like this facility is quite advanced.
Pulao seems to be abnormally familiar with this place.
It's tough. The info is all over the place. The data tags used to separate file blocks are the only decipherable parts.
So far, the parts that have been sorted out are 'Operation Acadia', 'Achilles Silo' and... 'Huaxu'?
So... this is how it has to end...
We must buy enough time for Lee to copy the data!
